DESCRIPTION: Increases the base stats of cards by #b25% until played.
Move the most recent cards in your discard pile to your hand.
Your next attack deals #b50% less damage.
When receiving #yAttack damage, deals damage back. NL At the start of your turn, lose Spikes if you were attacked.
A stunned enemy does nothing this turn.
#yRight #yClick to swap the effect of this card.
Upgrading Orbs makes them more powerful. Orbs can be upgraded any number of times.
Orb: Deals damage to the enemy with the least HP when you play an Attack. When #yEvoked, deals damage and applies #yLock-On to a random enemy.
Orb: Stores damage when you are attacked. When #yEvoked, deals damage to the enemy with the most HP.
Orb: Deals damage when you are attacked. When #yEvoked, grants #ySpikes.
